sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>When making a check to repair or craft a non-starship or vehicle item, the character may add force dice (white d12) no greater than Force rating to the check. The character may spend force points to permanently increase the number of hard points the item has by 1, to a maximum of 2 additional hard points. An item may only be improved in this way once.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>true</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Intuitive improvements</name> <number>TAL0001065</number> <passive_or_active>passive</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-21 23:36:04</sys_created_on> <sys_id>9675e7a4db2e0c542901de90cf961948</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-21 23:36:04</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
